::FZ::

FZ looks at Najah in slight confusion, realizing after a second what 
Najah had meant for a twin brother.

"He's not my twin brother," he replies, deciding it was easier to 
pass himself by as a clone than to explain how he had ended up 
outside his own time, "I'm his clone."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Najah::
> 
> "Yessss SSir" replied Najah "By the way, Your twin-brother it'sss 
> ssso brave massster... You musssst be proud of him... "
> 
> Najah was confusing Zardus with Future Zardus
